verbs.description: [ARG1: Harry Litman] [V: is] [ARG2: a former United States Attorney and Deputy Assistant Attorney General] . In today ’s New York Times he authors an op - ed which fairly demolishes Trump ’s assertion , via his lawyers , that he can not be held culpable for Obstruction of Justice , ...
